settings.editor: I am a professional freelancer who is passionate to work. My uncanny hunger for knowledge and eagerness to learn motivates me to improve and enhance my skillset. Ensuring that I do my best in everything that I do, I will strive to attain the best possible results.
I am a result-oriented individual who strives to do the best in everything that I do. Always hungry to learn more things and maximize my capabilities both as a professional and as an individual.
I am currently studying in QuickPro Online Academy to enhance my freelancing skillset and further improve my works.
Equipped with the skills to contribute as a team plater and generate leads for clients.

settings.title: Social Media Admin and Customer Relationship Management (CRM)

tabs.tab_content: Utilizing different plug-ins and themes, I am capable of creating optimized website that are not only aesthetically pleasing, but also highly functional and responsive; guaranteeing your customers a smooth high-quality experience. In addition, my skillset also covers backing-up a website's database and content.

Aside from a website's design, optimizing it is equally as important. By competitor hunting, expanding my keyword collection, and link building, I will ensure that your website's presence will be boosted in relevant online search results; generating more leads and traffic to your company. I will also utilize a handful of plug-ins to enhance your website's security, responsiveness, and overall load speed.

tabs.tab_title: Social Media Admin and Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
tabs.tab_content: In this day and age, utilizing different social media platforms is vital for any business. with my methods of knowing your platforms, taking advantage of social media ads, and optimizing your social media accounts, you will be able to boost your online presence, encourage customer engagement, generate video views, and so much more! I can also create a social media calendar with unique post ideas to gain brand awareness and generate more leads.

The success of content marketing and social media campaigns can be greatly influenced by visuals. Having an adequate understanding of Adobe Photoshop allows me to create T-shirt designs, convincing ad flyers, polished images, and so much more! I can also remove unwanted objects from images to create more aesthetically pleasing content.

The easiest and most convenient way to sell products worldwide without worrying about inventory and shipping - Shopify! With the combination of my skillset and by utilizing applications such as Oberlo, Yo Recent Sales Notifications, and McAfee Secure, I will make sure that your Shopify store will generate the leads that it needs and increase the sales you deserve.

Yet another convenient way to scale your business and sell your products - WooCommerce. With my added knowledge of website development and design, I will assure that your customers will be able to view and purchase your products with just a few clicks. I will also make sure to create links for upselling and cross selling to get those "last minute check-out sales"!

settings.editor: You are more than welcome to contact me. Schedule an interview, give me a call, or send me the job description. I reply promptly within 24-48 hours.
